com.jdroid.android.social.facebook

Class FacebookConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jdroid.android.social.facebook.FacebookConnector

  • public class FacebookConnector
extends Object
    This class handles all Facebook session events and requests.

    When using this class, clients MUST call all the public methods from the respective methods in either an Activity or Fragment. Failure to call all the methods can result in improperly initialized or uninitialized Sessions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FacebookConnector() 
      FacebookConnector(android.app.Activity activity) 
      FacebookConnector(android.app.Activity activity, SessionStateListener sessionStateListener, FacebookAuthenticationListener facebookAuthenticationListener)
      Creates a new FacebookConnector, building and activating a Session.

        public FacebookConnector(android.app.Activity activity,
                 SessionStateListener sessionStateListener,
                 FacebookAuthenticationListener facebookAuthenticationListener)
        Creates a new FacebookConnector, building and activating a Session.
        Parameters:
        activity - The Activity
        sessionStateListener - is a callback for session events.
        facebookAuthenticationListener - is a callback for Facebook login/logout event.

      • executeMeRequest

        public GraphUser executeMeRequest()
        This method execute a Facebook "MeRequest" to get user profile info for the current user. This method should not be called from the UI thread.
        Returns:
        GraphUser for the logged user
